titleStmt.title: Londons looking backe to Ierusalem, or, Gods iudgements vpon others, are to be obserued by vs
titleStmt.author: Jones, John, minister at St. Michael Basenshaw, London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones dwelling in Red-crosse-streete,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Gods iudgements upon others, are to be observed by us.
Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral Library.
